ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

Evidence of current Anorexia Nervosa
Evidence of past Anorexia Nervosa
Specify current Anorexia type
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 = Restricting type; 2 = Binge-eating/purging type; 3 = Atypical type

ElementDescription: Specify severity of current Anorexia
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 =  Mild (BMI greater than or equal to  17); 2 = Moderate (BMI 16-16.99); 3 = Severe (BMI 15-15.99); 4 = Extreme (BMI less than 15)

ElementDescription: Specify past Anorexia type
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 = Restricting type; 2 = Binge-eating/purging type; 3 = Atypical type

ElementDescription: Indicate severity of past Anorexia
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 =  Mild (BMI greater than or equal to  17); 2 = Moderate (BMI 16-16.99); 3 = Severe (BMI 15-15.99); 4 = Extreme (BMI less than 15)

ElementDescription: Meets criteria for consensus diagnosis of current Binge-Eating Disorder
Meets criteria for consensus diagnosis of past Binge-Eating Disorder
Indicate the level of severity of current Binge-Eating Disorder
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 = Mild (1-3 binges per week); 2 = Moderate (4-7 binges per week); 3 = Severe (8-13 binges per week); 4 = Extreme (14 or more binges per week)

ElementDescription: Indicate the level of severity of past Binge-Eating Disorder
Notes: 0 = No information; 1 = Mild (1-3 binges per week); 2 = Moderate (4-7 binges per week); 3 = Severe (8-13 binges per week); 4 = Extreme (14 or more binges per week)

ElementDescription: Meets criteria for consensus diagnosis of current Bulimia
Evidence of past Bulimia
Specify current Bulimia type
Notes: 0 = No Information; 1 = Purging Type; 2 = Non-Purging Type

ElementDescription: Indicate the level of severity of current Bulimia
Notes: 0 = No Information; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe; 4 = Extreme

ElementDescription: Specify past Bulimia Type
Notes: 0 = No Information; 1 = Purging Type; 2 = Non-Purging Type

ElementDescription: Indicate the level of severity of past Bulimia
Notes: 0 = No Information; 1 = Mild; 2 = Moderate; 3 = Severe; 4 = Extreme
